extendedInfo.description: Hold-Free lets the consumer avoid the stress and frustration of dealing with call centers. With Hold-Free consumers no longer need to search for 800 numbers, navigate phone trees or wait on hold for an agent to answer. Hold-Free allows the user to visually navigate the the phone menu on screen, while our servers do the dialing and waiting for you. When an agent is available the Hold-Free network calls you back so you never wait on hold.

reviews.comment: Ok, How Much Does This Cost? I see no reference to cost...other than Free download... but when I downloaded I see you have a billing department. ???
reviews.author: A Google User
